views.markdown:
Version: 1.6.2 - iOS 10 support Version: 1.6.1
- Better button positioning
- Support for iPad with camera flash (iOS 9)
Version: 1.6
- Fix button position on iOS 9 large-screen iPhone
Version: 1.5-19
- Fix button layout in iOS 9

Version: 1.5-18
- Fix button not hiding in some conditions in iOS 9

Version: 1.5-16
- Fix crash in iOS 9

Version: 1.5-15
- Adjustment for iOS 9 devices

Version: 1.5-13
- iOS 9 support
Version: 1.5-12
- Fix flashlight blink bug.
Version: 1.5-11
- Fix crash in iOS 7.0
Version: 1.5-10
- (iOS 7+) Added option "Button at right".

Version: 1.5-9
- Fixed compatibility with FrontFlash tweak.
Version: 1.5-8
- Bugs fixed and improvement.

Version: 1.5-7
- Fix bug when adjust torch level in video mode.

Version: 1.5-6
- Prevent crash bug when orientation is changed.

Version: 1.5-5
- Another fix for bootloop

Version: 1.5-3
- Concept rebuilt. Now PhotoTorch is much easier to use.
- Thanks to John Burns for his convenient suggestions.

Version: 1.5-1
- Nemerous bugs fixed.
- Rewrited codes.
- PhotoTorch's properties are now adjustable from settings.
- New UI. (iOS 7+)
Version: 1.4-7
- Fix some torch bugs.

Version: 1.4-5
- Fixed torch not working in video mode when PhotoTorch option is turned on.
- Fixed a possible crash bug.

Version: 1.4-4
- Bugs fixed and improvement, especially for iOS 8.
Version: 1.4-2
- Fixed some possible crashing
Version: 1.4-1
- UI tweaked.
- Initial iOS 8 support.
Version: 1.3-13
- The update to fix freeze or crash bug in iOS 7.1.x
Version: 1.3-12
- Better compatibility for iOS 7.1.x

Version: 1.3-11
- Support for iOS 7.1.x, but still need improvement because of flashlight system changing
Version: 1.3-10
- Fixed crash bug in iOS 6
Version: 1.3-9
- (iOS 7) Remove unwanted toggling torch in video mode using the orange switcher.
Version: 1.3-8
(Fixes For iOS 7)
- Top Bar UI Glitches.
- Top Bar extra panels (by PhotoTorch), and height are incorrect.
Version: 1.3-7
- Removed unnecessary code Version: 1.3-6
- Move the HDR button/Elapsed time view at the top bar into the correct position. (iOS 7.0)
- Fixed some bug with Flash Mode option. (iOS 7)
- Longer slider. (iOS 7)

Version: 1.3-5
- Bug fixed when the torch brightness becomes maximum even if the slider doesn't. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.3-4
- Bug fixed, improvement and optimization
Version: 1.3-1
- Supported iOS 7: a new design of PhotoTorch, access tweak functions directly from the Top Bar, plus some bonus.
- Fixed value saving bug.
- Updated description. (Recommended you to read if you are at iOS 7)

Version: 1.2-2
- Optimization and fixed icon positioning.
Version: 1.2-1
- Restore original state correctly when user turn off "Torch Mode" when "Flash Mode" is off.
- Code reduction.
- Updated description.

Version: 1.1-13
- Supported BiteSMS. ;)

Version 1.1-9
- Memory management fixed.

Version 1.1-8
- Fixed saving bug for "Flash Mode"
- Fixed compatibility with Velox.
- Fixed torch on when camera is not active.
- Fixed bug when you capture more than 1 image and camera flashes even "Flash Mode" is off.
Version 1.1-7
- Bugs fixed.

Version 1.1-6
- Bug fixed when torch brightness isn't match with torch level set. (after the flash)

Version 1.1-5
- Fixed some crashes.

Version 1.1-4
- Fixed bug when take photo with Flash Mode and Torch Mode on and after that torch is off.
- Flash Mode now should works properly.
- Code reduced.
Version 1.1-3
- Code refactored.

Version 1.1-2
- Hide PhotoTorch settings in options menu when camera device isn't rear-facing camera and not in photo mode.

Version 1.1-1
- Fixed memory leaks.
- Code refactored.
- Integrated "No Flash Fire" Option into Camera options menus, usage in Settings.
This tweak comes back with better coding after some huge problems that cause this tweak to be suspended. Version 1.0-4
- Removed unnecessary bits.

Version 1.0-3
- Fixed option "No Flash Fire" not working properly.
- Added supported in SpringBoard Camera.
- Removed delay set by code when turning Torch On.
Version 1.0-2
- Updated to fix some reported bug.
